item.title: Seamless Auth System Migration
item.description: Auth System Migration After joining a Bangalore startup after college, due to my previous experience in working with auth systems, I was given the task to change the current auth system from admin-secret based to a token-based auth system. Note, our prod server has 5000 active users daily. item.title: helloWorld
item.description: Hey readers! I’m thrilled to start documenting my learning journey as a web developer, and this blog marks the beginning of that adventure. From now on, I will be sharing my experiences, challenges, and progress as a full stack developer. Why Hugo? You might wonder why I chose Hugo over a more complex web framework. The answer is simple: for a static application like this, Hugo is not only sufficient but also highly efficient.
